divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and I were at the Coachella Concert in Indio, Ca and we were looking into the night sky. we saw a very fast moving star like light moving a across the sky at a very fast speed. Suddenly, the light made a 45 degree turn in direction and continued straight until we lost track of it.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Indio
There were no other sightings in Indio on or around April 18th 2009
Summary: Bright dot shooting south then doing a 45 degree turn SouthWest.
